messages.messageBody:
Where are you? We're in need of one or two kittens here! Any chance you're
in
reasonable distance to Salem, MA? (Yeah, right)

Kathryn



*** I don't think we're close enough, although in the grand scheme of the US
we're not as far away as we could be... I'm in SC.

Myranda
Mommy to Brett (7.5), Tyler (6), and Cassidy (16 mths)

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Puppies?
messages.msgSnippet: Which reminds me that a fair number of folks look on the Yahoo Classifieds for pets.  I got my three Pomeranians that way, and they re wonderful! Folks with
messages.messageBody:
Which reminds me that a fair number of folks look on the Yahoo Classifieds
for pets. I got my three Pomeranians that way, and they're wonderful!

Folks with pets might want to check the Yahoo Classd's out. I think
they're free.
HeidiWD

messages.subject: Puppies?
messages.msgSnippet:
Arg! I ve read through 5 digests now, and only caught bits and pieces of
the puppy conversation. Has anyone suggested the best way to find them GOOD
homes and
messages.messageBody:
Arg! I've read through 5 digests now, and only caught bits and pieces of
the puppy conversation. Has anyone suggested the best way to find them GOOD
homes and I've maybe missed it? We have a stray and her 9 pups that will be
ready for homes next week, and I'm undecided about whether to just take them
to the flea market and give them to whoever will take them or to take them
to the rescue shelter. We've also got a stray cat that just had 3 kittens
two weeks ago under the house, so we'll have to do something with them too
in about a month. I don't have the money to run an ad or to keep any of them
much as I'd love to. Three dogs, four cats, and a horse is our limit, I'm
afraid. These have got to go.

Myranda
Mommy to Brett (7.5), Tyler (6), and Cassidy (16 mths)
AIM myrandamomof3
